value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Configure subscriptions
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure subscriptions including obtaining a subscription, implementing cost management, and applying resource tags.

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Service Bus Queues. value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
value.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

value.title: Configure app service plans
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure the App Service Plan including pricing and scaling.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
value.excerpt: Learn about the virtual private network (VPN) gateway options in Azure and typical scenarios for using a VPN. Create and test VPNs to securely connect sites to Azure.

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Azure AD

value.title: Describe security management capabilities of Azure
value.excerpt: Describe security management capabilities of Azure

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
value.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.
